title: Andrei Martin
text:
Andrei Martin (born 27 June 1974) is a Moldovan <a href="association%20football">football</a> manager and former player who is currently the manager of <a href="Dacia%20Buiucani">Dacia Buiucani</a>. 
Career.
He has played in the <a href="Moldovan%20National%20Division">Moldovan National Division</a> from the early 1990s until 2011, for multiple clubs, most notably <a href="Dacia%20Chi%C8%99in%C4%83u">Dacia Chișinău</a>.
Previously he worked as the assistant manager of <a href="Dorinel%20Munteanu">Dorinel Munteanu</a> at Romanian club <a href="Astra%20Giurgiu">Astra Giurgiu</a> (March–April 2015), Azeri club <a href="FK%20Q%C3%A4b%C3%A4l%C3%A4">FK Qäbälä</a> (June–December 2014) and Russian clubs <a href="Kuban%20Krasnodar">Kuban Krasnodar</a> (July–October 2013), and <a href="Mordovia%20Saransk">Mordovia Saransk</a> (January–June 2013).
Andrei Martin holds a UEFA PRO Manager Licence.
He has been an assistant coach for the <a href="Moldova%20national%20football%20team">Moldova national team</a> on three occasions.
